sentences: Kontrollige, kas kõik asjad on alles.
Tulin alles töölt, pole jõudnud veel riideidki vahetada.
context: The Estonian word 'olemas' is the inessive case form of the verb 'olema' (to be). It has multiple meanings including: 1) still, remaining - indicating something that continues to exist or persists; 2) only, just - expressing limitation or emphasis; 3) yet - referring to something happening at a later time than expected. Its usage varies depending on context but generally relates to existence, continuation, or temporal relationships.
